name: Web Project - Webcam/Chat site
short_description:
Looking for a long-term programmer to create a website involving one-to-one webcam sharing with chat capabilities.

Our idea involves a structure and functionality to that of www.chatroulette.com with the addition of a payment system.

The design will be very modern, minimalistic, and clean.

We will be implementing usage of statistics to track user behavior in real-time.

Flash P2P to implement the webcams. Cloud based computing experience required (amazon EC2 etc).

Applicant must be proficient in PHP/Ruby, Java, node.js, css, and overall knows how to create & manage a large website.

Our budget is between $5000 - $10,000 

Extra consideration for those who feel passionate about writing tightly written code that both scales and is secure.
